sentence.Network_cn: 部长的来信怀疑我的诚实，质疑我的动机。

sentence.Network_en: He was shocked to find his veracity questioned.
sentence.Network_cn: 发现自己的诚信受到了质疑，他很震惊。

sentence.Network_en: They questioned the veracity of her story.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们质疑她所述事情的真实性。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French véracité or medieval Latin veracitas, from verax 'speaking truly' (see veracious)

entry.def: Veracity is the quality of being true or the habit of telling the truth.

example.ex: We have total confidence in the veracity of our research...
example.tran: 我们对我们调查的真实性有十足的把握。

example.ex: He was shocked to find his veracity questioned.
example.tran: 发现自己的诚信受到了质疑，他很震惊。

auth_sentence.content: The veracity of the incident has come under question.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The veracity of the incident has come under question.

auth_sentence.content: Doda Conrad's veracity is unknown to me.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ver真实+acious多……的→很多真实→可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能作证的, 能证实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: verify[v.证实,查证;证明]+able能……的→verifiable能作证的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 真正的, 真实的, 恰好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ver真实+y→真正的, 真实的→完全
ver真实+y→真正的, 真实的→完全

stems_affixes.value_cn: [陪审团的]裁决,判决;判断;定论
真实, 事实, 真理, 真实的陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: ver真实+ity表名词→n.真实, 事实, 真理, 真实的陈述

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"有……倾向;能力或特性等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap拿,抓+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→拿住的能力→容量;才能
auda大胆+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.大胆,鲁莽
loqu说话+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.多话,饶舌
mend缺点+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.虚假
rap夺+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.掠夺,贪婪
ten握住+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→tenacious的名词
ver真+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.真实性,诚实

sentences.en: I can speak to his veracity.
sentences.cn: 我可以证明他说的是实话。

sentences.en: I can testify to this man’s veracity and good character.
sentences.cn: 我可以作证,此人诚实可靠,品德良好。

sentences.en: There is no reason to doubt the veracity of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 没有理由怀疑证据的真实性。
